TopicTitle: Mini reports thread: a place for reports too short for a full mission report

Articles.Content:
I am making this thread as a place for small short reports, like, if you want to report about only one part of a mission, or about a mission you think is too short for a full report. For example: I had some trouble while setting up a module in my Duna base and I had to use the eva repair kits for the first time and I also used kas to attach a rover to the base. I could tell the short story about my troubles with my base and how I used eva repair kits, here, instead of having to report about the Duna base mission as a whole, I could report about only that part. This thread can also be used to report about a whole mission, if you do not think it is long enough for a whole report. The thing that inspired me to create this thread was when I felt anxious about posting my sub-orbital spaceplane mission, of fear that it was too basic and short of a mission for a full report, and I decided to also make it be a place for partial reports, after what happened at my Duna base, and wanting to report about only that.
